title: The Disaster Ahead If We Lose This Election (Ep 1303)
description:
In this episode, I address the Democrats’ increasingly hostile attacks on law and order and the role of big donors such as George Soros in the funding of anti-law and order candidates. I also address the 10 disasters coming our way if the Democrats win the Senate and force through their agenda. 

News Picks:


Kayleigh McEnany wrecks another clueless liberal “reporter.”


Here’s what could be included in the next coronavirus relief bill.

Federal Judge smacks down De Blasio and Cuomo for targeting religious services. 

Google appears to have a blacklist for some conservative news sites. 

The Trump campaign’s texting program is under attack by these companies.


Major League Baseball is about to destroy itself.

Despite the pressure campaign, the Atlanta Braves will not change their name.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
